title: Can I send the same essay to the same college twice? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can, but it is a terrible idea. Even if a college is for some reason asking very similar questions in their essays, it will make you look like you are either lazy or at best made a mistake and didn’t proofread your essays (as you copied and pasted the same essay for two prompts). Take some time to develop unique essays that are actually tailored to the essay prompt. The good news is that the best essays actually come from your personal life experience. Everything you need is already in your head! The best way to write your essay is through a story and the Storybuilder platform offers one of the easiest ways to get started. Best of luck!

Same essay to the same college??? Do you want to reapply to this college after being rejected? If your application was rejected, why would you want to use the same essay? You need to show how much you’ve grown and what you achieved in the last year. A new, updated application would give you a better chance than reusing the old one.

No you cannot, you cannot even send the same essay to any other university or college if its been submitted. As that will come under plagiarism. In case if you are stuck with your University assignments, than you can contact Assignment Studio for urgent assignments.

Are you considering using the same response to two prompts? Not a good idea. Each part of the application is designed to reveal additional information and should provide insight into another aspect of your personality. Don’t waste the opportunity to enhance your application.
